name: wristband-python-fastapi-accelerator
description: Full-stack application accelerator with FastAPI backend and Next.js frontend

database.start: concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run database" "npm run frontend"
database.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
database.setup: npm install && npm run setup-python && cd frontend && npm install
database.install-firebase: npm install -g firebase-tools && echo 'Firebase tools installed globally. You may need to login with: firebase login'
